comment: I thought that Dr. Naidu was spectacular this semester. I was really an awful math student in high school, but I did pretty well in her class. Everything about this course was very straightforward. She is more than happy to help you and always responds to emails. I recommend this course, especially to people who think they're bad at math.

Homes loved her. I was a little nervous going in because I havent taken math since high school, but she breaks everything down completely. Shes super sweet and British. You do have homework every week, but she shows you how to do it in recorded lectures and the worst 4 grades are dropped. Honestly easy A. No lockdown browser on test either.

I have not finished this class yet. But as of right now, I have a 99. And that is after two tests! Synchronized online class but she records all lectures. Attendance is required. Practice tests help! No extra credit! Will do private tutor sessions! Homework through Aleks. Must work for grade. 3 tests and final. Great teacher over all!

MyMathLab will destroy you. It's a horrible website that never works properly. You will lose your sanity! Every time you put the correct answer it will mark it as wrong. and homework is like a major part of your grade. To bad she forces you to use this hw website that can do its job

Great Professor!! She was very helpful to those who didn't understand the material and broke it down Barney style. Easy homework assignments but make sure to remember to check mymathlabs  for assignments.

LOVED HER! If you want a understanding professor and someone who will help you succeed this is her. I struggle in math but she really helped me understand it more. I took her for 2 years and would do it again.
This class is awful, she is not helpful and I would not recommend her to anyone who struggles in math or needs support.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Decent professor, she can be a bit tough.
shes great
She's British so that's amazing. Very good math teacher. Very very clear and so helpful. TAKE PRACTICE TESTS and DO YOUR HW. She makes it easy to understand and I suck at math. Very very nice too.

LOVED her! Really great math teacher, one o the best ones I have ever had before. Had her for remedial and never made below a 100%. She goes on schedule with the syllabus which I liked so you know what you are doing before class. 4 tests that you take online and homework every week that helps boost your grade as well. Taking her next semester!

Sped through Algebra 1 but she's very clear in her lectures and doesn't make things confusing at all. Great teacher if you're a note-taker (Clear, thorough notes on the board). Offers HW help in office hours. Doesn't mess around with grades and offers no bonus opportunities but she drops your lowest test grade (of 4) for your grade on the final.

Dr. Naidu is the best teacher ever! She answers any questions you have and gives practice tests that have the test questions in them! If you understand the practice test, there is no doubt you will get an A on the test. She is also funny and I really enjoyed having her.

Best teacher you will ever have for math. seriously!!! I hated math before and couldn't  understand anything and she had a way of teaching it and making it simple. I love her and she is truly  genuine. If you want a good teacher pick her!!! Best teacher at Kennesaw!!!!
Great teacher! She does require attendance. You will have math homework every week but it helps. She will work with you to make you a better math student. I suggest to take her!
Professor Naidu is the best math teacher I have ever had. You have 4 tests plus the finals, and an online homework each week. I strongly recommend taking her. You won't regret it!

Ms Naidu is the best teacher I have ever had. I am lucky enough to have her next semester too! She teaches learning support math, so clearly I am not a math person, but after having her I feel like I am. Not only is she a awesome teacher, shes really friendly and she has the cutest english accent. Her class is awesome.
Super nice teacher. Tries to make it easy to understand even for those of us who dont get it.Take her class!

i absolutely loved this teacher, she was fantastic, making sure that every single student caught on to what she was saying. willing to spend extra time on things with us, very awesome lady. has an accent, but it is not at all an obstacle. her teaching style is going through the information with the students as though they haven't learned it before.
The best for vets, If not her Mrs Jones.Do what she tells you to do and you will make the grade and don't study with people that don't come to class.Buy the online book it helps more.
Awesome teacher. Made me really understand math again. Wished she taught 1111 or 1101. Would love to have her as a teacher again!
Great teacher.Very helpful at all times.
wonderful teacher!

Amazing Prof!  She does such a great job explaining the material, and catering to different learning levels.  She was able to pull along a class full of non math people - and aid me in my curiously strange deep math questions at the same time.  She is the reason that I want to be a math major now.  She is a great PROF - For non math people too!

very nice lady, very good teacher. however, if you have any difficulites in math and never took algebra, she can be defeating if you do not do well on first 2 tests. told me that i would not pass regardless of anything I did for rest of semester. to drop puts you out of school---so i stopped going! this is a learning support class!
Nice, funny, sweet. An excellent teacher, she has a way with the numbers. :0)
Great teacher; Mrs. Naidu cares about your grade and is very helpful. Meets during office hours, answers questions during class.
i LOVED her! she was awesome. i am not a math person at all, and she really helped me out. she is very funny to, very pleasant to be with, you will be very lucky to have her class :]

Ms.Naidu is the best math teacher ever!! She is very helpful and truly cares about her students. She makes class easy to understand and her teaching style is unique. I will highly recommend Ms Naidu to everyone. She is great!! take her, you won't regret it

Ms. Naidu is the best teacher ever!  She is extremely helpful and teaches with such clarity.  She is very organized and cares a lot about her students.  I wish I could have her for all my math classes!

I took Naidu for 97 and rearranged my entire schedule to get her again for 98.  She is a very understanding teacher.  Since she teaches mostly adult learners, having a teacher understand why you're not in class bc of family emergencies is great.
BEST TEACHER YET! Highly recommend her to learn the subject matter! If you don't want to get lost, don't miss class though.

excellent professor always willing to help gives step by step notes reviews before every test-highly recommended-she moves through material quickly but is always willing to stop to answer questions-it's a good idea to attend class on a regular basis or you will get behind fast

Great teacher.  Very easy.  She makes sure you know the material before a test.  Will help you out in any way.  Very easy to get an A with her.  Attendance is not mandatory but you can get behind in the material if you miss class.
Extremely helpful.  Wants to make sure everyone passes and understands the material.
If you want to learn math take one of Mrs. Naidu classes. Great teacher and a very nice person; I learned and understood algebra because of her.  Highly recommend  this professor. .

She was awesome!She is not intimidating, and she is fun!She knows her information and if you have a question, just ask because she will help you and wont make you feel dumb!She tries so hard to do what she can to make sure the whole class understands the material.no reason why you cant get a good grade in her class! :-)

you can't miss this class or you will be totally behind. naidu is a good teacher, but if you're confused, don't wait for the answers, ASK. if you're math retarded like me, don't take 0099, take 0097 and 0098.
I loved Mrs. Naidu. She is always willing to answer any questions you have. If shes going too fast you can ask her to slow down... She's a gret professor! Take her if you can!
awesome teacher. definitely take her for this class, she's really easy to follow, makes it interesting, and invites questions.

very good prof. she cares and wants you to get good grades. she gave me a few extra points in the end to boost me to an A. very good! take her          also she cusses from time to time which is funny because she is a older indian lady with a british accent...haha
SHE IS A VERY NICE TEACHER, & VERY HELPFUL TO ALL STUDENTS... SHE IS ALSO A VERY COOL & DOWN-TO-EARTH WOMAN..
Don't miss out on this awsome teacher.  She will make you love math.
She really knows how to explain math. Great Teacher.
She is a wonderful teacher!  She helped me so much with math. Really nice and caring to every student!
She is a women a many wounders!!! Get to love her!!! She gets a DOUBLE WOW from me!!!
Mrs. Naidu is a very nice person and good teacher. She goes over the material pretty fast though so you must keep up with homework.

MRS. NAIDU IS THE BEST!  HER TEACHING TECHNIQUES ARE AWESOME.  SHE PROVIDE EXAMPLES OF HOW TO WORK THE PROBLEMS AND IF YOU DO NOT UNDERSTAND SHE  WILL GO OVER THE PROBLEM(S)WITH YOU.  MATH HAS ALWAYS BEEN MY WORST SUBJECT; HOWEVER MRS. NAIDU MADE MATH ALMOST FUN.  I CAME OUT OF THIS CLASS WITH CONFI

Mrs. Niadu is the sweetest teacher I have ever had!  She is funny and caring.  She is a lot of fun to be around the atmosphere in her class is light and easygoing!!  I recommend her for all classes 97/98/1101
Thanks!  You rock!!  EAsy to understand, helpful and interactive, I wouldn't have passed without you
Pinder rocks! Super nice, very supportive. Not as fun as Birrell but, close. Very easy to work with.
